General.Name: Bitcoin Group SE
General.Description: Bitcoin Group SE, an investment holding company, engages in the cryptocurrency and blockchain businesses worldwide. The company operates a trading platform for the digital currency bitcoin under the Bitcoin.de. It also provides financial services. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Herford, Germany. Bitcoin Group SE is a subsidiary of Priority AG.

2.Name: Mr. Per  Hlawatschek
2.Title: Member of Management Board & Chief Information Officer
